testimonials.default1: Outstanding {{service}} service! The team went above and beyond to ensure our shipments arrived on time and in perfect condition.
testimonials.default2: The level of professionalism and attention to detail is unmatched. Highly recommend their services for any logistics needs.
testimonials.default3: Reliable and efficient service. The real-time tracking and communication made the entire process smooth and transparent.

caseStudy.defaultChallenge: Complex international logistics requiring coordination across 15 countries with varying regulations and time-sensitive deliveries.
caseStudy.defaultSolution: Implemented comprehensive {{service}} solution with dedicated account management, custom tracking systems, and strategic partnership network.

faq.question1: What makes your {{service}} different from competitors?
faq.answer1: We combine cutting-edge technology with decades of industry expertise to deliver customized solutions. Our global network, real-time tracking, and dedicated support team ensure superior service quality.
faq.question2: How quickly can I get started?
faq.answer2: Most clients can begin using our {{service}} within 24-48 hours. We provide rapid onboarding with dedicated support to ensure smooth integration with your existing operations.
faq.answer3: We offer flexible pricing models including volume-based discounts, contract rates, and pay-per-use options. Contact our team for a customized quote based on your specific requirements.
faq.answer4: Yes, comprehensive insurance coverage is available for all shipments. We offer various coverage levels to match your cargo value and risk tolerance.

about.title: About Molo Logistics
about.subtitle: A leading force in global logistics and transportation
about.heroSubtitle: For over 25 years, MoloChain has been at the forefront of global logistics, delivering innovative solutions that keep businesses moving and economies growing.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: At Molo, we believe in a human-centric and collaborative approach. Every customer is not just a client but a partner and friend. Our commitment to transparency, trust, and quality service delivery has made us a credible and trustworthy brand in the global transportation industry.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Operating across Europe, Africa, Russia, USA, Canada, Brazil, and Mexico

trackRecord.title: Proven Track Record
trackRecord.description: Over 60,000 TEU containers exported and 18,000 TEU containers imported annually

humanCentric.title: Human-Centric
humanCentric.description: Building lasting partnerships through collaborative customer relationships

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.description: Collaborating with major commercial companies worldwide

mission.title: Empowering Global Trade Through Innovation
mission.description1: At MoloChain, we believe that efficient logistics is the backbone of global commerce. Our mission is to provide seamless, technology-driven supply chain solutions that enable businesses of all sizes to compete on the world stage.
mission.description2: Founded with a vision to revolutionize logistics, we've grown from a regional freight forwarder to a comprehensive global logistics provider. Today, we serve over 10,000 customers across 180+ countries, offering 46+ specialized services.

values.title: Our Values
values.heading: What Drives Us Forward
values.subtitle: Our core values define who we are and guide every decision we make in serving our customers.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We deliver on our promises with consistent, dependable service that you can count on.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Leveraging cutting-edge technology to optimize logistics and drive efficiency.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Your success is our priority. We build lasting partnerships through exceptional service.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear communication and real-time visibility throughout your supply chain.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Committed to continuous improvement and delivering best-in-class solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Operating with honesty and ethical standards in every business relationship.

leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.heading: Expert Team Driving Excellence
leadership.subtitle: Our leadership team brings decades of combined experience in global logistics and supply chain management.

executive.name: Executive Team
executive.description: Guiding Molochain's global vision and growth strategy

operations.name: Operations Team
operations.description: Managing worldwide logistics network and service delivery

technology.name: Technology Team
technology.description: Driving digital transformation and platform development

commercial.name: Commercial Team
commercial.description: Building partnerships and expanding market presence

globalPresence.title: Global Presence
globalPresence.heading: Strategically Located Worldwide
globalPresence.subtitle: Our global network of offices ensures we're always close to where you need us.
globalPresence.description: Our strategic network of warehouses and shipping routes spans major global trading hubs, enabling efficient and reliable logistics solutions worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to Partner with MoloChain?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses worldwide who trust MoloChain for their logistics needs. Let's discuss how we can help optimize your supply chain.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description1: Molo is one of the leading organizations active in international transportation, logistics, and foreign trade, holding official licenses in Iran and Turkey. This company offers comprehensive logistics and trade services to and from key global destinations.
expertise.description2: The company's presence in Iran, Turkey, the UK, the UAE, and China strengthens its global connections and service capabilities. Moreover, Molo's membership in reputable international associations ensures fast and effective communication, enhancing the overall customer experience.
expertise.description3: Our expertise in shipping trade and freight forwarding combines complex skills, specialized knowledge, and operational execution to ensure safe, economical, and efficient global transportation.

seo.title: About Us - MoloChain | Global Logistics Solutions
seo.description: Learn about MoloChain - a global logistics leader operating in 180+ countries with 25+ years of experience. Discover our mission, values, and commitment to excellence in supply chain solutions.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates on logistics innovations and exclusive offers

brand.description: Revolutionizing the $9.1 trillion logistics industry with enterprise technology, AI-powered automation, and advanced analytics. Building the future of transparent, efficient global trade.

footer.copyright: © {{year}} MOLOCHAIN. All rights reserved. Built with excellence and innovation.

apiPolicies.title: API Policies
apiPolicies.subtitle: Important information about rate limiting and API versioning

alerts.rateLimitsDescription: All API endpoints are subject to rate limiting to ensure platform stability and fair usage.
alerts.apiVersioningDescription: Our API uses date-based versioning to ensure backward compatibility while enabling new features.
alerts.needHigherLimitsDescription: If you need higher rate limits, please contact our sales team to discuss Enterprise options.

rateLimiting.title: Rate Limiting Policy
rateLimiting.description: MOLOCHAIN implements rate limiting to protect our infrastructure and ensure fair usage of our API resources. Rate limits are applied on a per-endpoint and per-authentication basis.
rateLimiting.tiersDescription: Rate limits vary based on your account tier:
rateLimiting.headersDescription: All API responses include headers that provide information about your current rate limit status:
rateLimiting.handlingDescription: When a rate limit is exceeded, the API will respond with a 429 Too Many Requests status code. Clients should implement proper error handling and backoff strategies.

tiers.developerNotes: Free tier for development and testing

doList.monitor: Monitor your rate limit usage via response headers

dontList.share: Share API credentials across multiple applications

codeExamples.title: Code Examples
codeExamples.handlingHeadersDesc: How to track and respond to rate limit information
codeExamples.exponentialBackoffDesc: Advanced retry strategy for rate limited requests
codeExamples.specifyVersionDesc: Different methods to specify which API version to use

versioning.title: API Versioning
versioning.description: MOLOCHAIN uses a versioning strategy to ensure that changes to our API don't break existing integrations. We provide stable API versions with clear deprecation timelines.
versioning.dateBasedDescription: We use date-based versioning in the format YYYY-MM-DD. This approach allows us to:

dateBasedBenefits.release: Release new features without breaking existing integrations
dateBasedBenefits.timeline: Provide a clear timeline for API changes
dateBasedBenefits.select: Allow clients to select specific API behavior

versioning.specifyDescription: You can specify which API version to use through one of the following methods:
versioning.defaultVersionDescription: If no version is specified, the API will use the oldest non-deprecated version. However, we strongly recommend always specifying a version explicitly.

accordion.headerInstruction: Include the X-API-Version header in your request:
accordion.urlInstruction: Include the major version number in the URL path:
accordion.urlNote: Note: URL versioning only supports major version numbers (v1, v2, etc.), not specific dates.
accordion.acceptInstruction: Include the version in the Accept header:

statuses.currentDesc: Latest stable version with all new features
statuses.maintainedDesc: Fully supported with security updates but no new features
statuses.deprecatedDesc: Still available but planned for removal, migration recommended

headers.rateLimitLimit: The maximum number of requests allowed in the current time window
headers.rateLimitRemaining: The number of requests remaining in the current time window
headers.rateLimitReset: The Unix timestamp when the rate limit resets
headers.retryAfter: The number of seconds to wait before retrying (only present when rate limited)

authGuide.title: API Authentication Guide
authGuide.subtitle: Secure your API interactions with MOLOCHAIN's authentication system

alerts.authVsAuthzDesc: Authentication verifies who you are, while authorization determines what you can access.

overview.title: Authentication Overview
overview.description: The MOLOCHAIN platform uses a secure, multi-layered authentication system to protect user data and ensure that only authorized users can access sensitive information.
overview.methodsDescription: Our API supports multiple authentication methods:

methods.sessionDesc: Using HTTP cookies for web applications
methods.jwtDesc: For mobile apps and external integrations

flow.title: Authentication Flow
flow.description: Standard authentication process for accessing protected resources
flow.step1Desc: Create an account or authenticate with existing credentials
flow.step2Desc: Server issues a token or session cookie upon successful authentication
flow.step3Desc: Attach token to subsequent API requests
flow.step4Desc: Server validates token for each protected request
flow.step5Desc: Refresh expired tokens to maintain session

security.title: Security Recommendations
security.description: Best practices for implementing secure authentication
security.https: Always use HTTPS for all API requests
security.storeTokens: Store tokens securely (HttpOnly cookies for web apps)
security.refresh: Implement token refresh mechanisms before expiration
security.errorHandling: Implement proper error handling without exposing sensitive info

endpoints.title: Authentication Endpoints
endpoints.description: The following endpoints are used for user authentication in the MOLOCHAIN platform. All authentication requests should be sent with Content-Type: application/json.

login.title: Login Endpoint
login.description: Authenticate users with email and password
login.methodDesc: Authenticates a user and returns a session cookie or JWT token

refresh.title: Token Refresh Endpoint
refresh.methodDesc: Refreshes an expired JWT token using a refresh token or session cookie

logout.title: Logout Endpoint
logout.description: Invalidate the current session or token
logout.methodDesc: Logs out the current user by invalidating their session or token

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.description: Once authenticated, users must be authorized to access specific resources. Authorization determines what actions a user can perform.
authorization.methodsDescription: The MOLOCHAIN platform implements the following authorization methods:

methods.resourceDesc: Permissions based on ownership or relationship to resources
methods.scopedDesc: Tokens with limited permissions for specific operations

authorization.rolesDescription: The platform defines several roles with different permission levels:
authorization.scopesDescription: When creating API tokens, you can specify scopes to limit their permissions:
authorization.makingRequestsDesc: How to include authorization information in your API requests
authorization.bearerAuthDesc: Include your JWT token or API key in the Authorization header:
authorization.cookieAuthDesc: When using cookie-based authentication, include the credentials option in your fetch or axios requests:
authorization.handlingErrorsDesc: Common authorization error responses and how to handle them

examples.title: Code Examples
examples.description: The following examples demonstrate how to implement authentication and authorization in different programming languages and environments.
examples.loginDesc: How to authenticate users with the login API
examples.authorizedRequestsDesc: How to include authorization in API requests
examples.tokenRefreshDesc: How to implement automatic token refresh
examples.twoFactorDesc: How to implement two-factor authentication verification

websocket.title: WebSocket API Guide
websocket.subtitle: Learn how to integrate with our real-time WebSocket APIs for live updates and notifications

alert.title: Documentation Purpose
alert.description: This documentation covers how to interact with the MOLOCHAIN platform's WebSocket APIs for real-time data.

sections.introductionDescription: WebSockets provide a persistent connection between a client and server, allowing for bi-directional, real-time data transfer. Unlike HTTP, which follows a request-response pattern, WebSockets enable the server to push data to clients without the client having to request it.
sections.whenToUseDescription: WebSockets are ideal for applications that require real-time functionality, such as:

benefits.realTimeUpdatesDesc: Receive instant notifications and data updates without polling
benefits.reducedLatencyDesc: Minimize communication overhead with persistent connections
benefits.bidirectionalDesc: Enable interactive features and real-time collaboration
benefits.efficientBandwidthDesc: Lower data transfer overhead compared to HTTP polling

useCases.liveTracking: Live tracking of shipments and logistics operations

availableServices.title: Available WebSocket Services
availableServices.description: Our platform offers multiple WebSocket endpoints for specific use cases

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to start using our WebSocket APIs

tracking.title: Tracking WebSocket
tracking.description: Real-time shipment and container tracking updates

step2.title: Choose the appropriate WebSocket endpoint
step2.description: Select the endpoint that matches your requirements

step3.title: Implement client-side WebSocket handling
step3.description: Use our code examples to connect to the WebSocket service

step4.title: Handle connection management
step4.description: Implement reconnection logic for robust connectivity

endpoints.title: WebSocket Endpoints
endpoints.description: Our platform provides multiple WebSocket endpoints, each designed for specific types of real-time communication. Connect to the appropriate endpoint based on your integration needs.

main.title: Main WebSocket
main.description: General-purpose WebSocket for platform-wide events and updates

tracking.title: Tracking WebSocket
tracking.description: Real-time tracking updates for shipments, containers, and vehicles

collaboration.title: Collaboration WebSocket
collaboration.description: Real-time collaboration features for multi-user interactions

main.ping: Keep-alive message to prevent connection timeout

tracking.subscribe: Subscribe to tracking updates for specific shipments
tracking.event: Significant events (e.g., arrival, departure, customs clearance)

authentication.title: WebSocket Authentication
authentication.description: All WebSocket connections require authentication to access protected endpoints. After establishing a WebSocket connection, you must send an authentication message to verify your identity.

methods.title: Authentication Methods
methods.description: We support multiple methods for authenticating WebSocket connections:

tokenAuth.title: Token-Based Authentication
tokenAuth.description: Send a JWT token after connecting. This is the recommended method for most applications.

sessionAuth.title: Session-Based Authentication
sessionAuth.description: If you have an active session (cookie-based), the WebSocket connection will automatically inherit the session.

example.title: Authentication Example
example.description: How to authenticate after establishing a WebSocket connection

securityNote.title: Security Best Practice
securityNote.description: Never expose your authentication tokens in client-side code that can be viewed publicly. Always use secure WebSocket connections (wss://) in production.

examples.title: Code Examples
examples.description: The following examples demonstrate how to connect to and interact with our WebSocket APIs in different programming environments.

browser.title: Browser WebSocket Example
browser.description: Basic WebSocket connection using the browser's native WebSocket API

nodejs.title: Node.js WebSocket Example
nodejs.description: WebSocket connection using the ws package for Node.js applications

python.title: Python WebSocket Example
python.description: WebSocket connection using the websockets library for Python applications

reconnection.title: Reconnection Logic
reconnection.description: Robust WebSocket connection with automatic reconnection and exponential backoff

landing.title: Molochain
landing.description: Centralized system administration and management for the Molochain platform. Monitor, configure, and control all aspects of your logistics ecosystem.

features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to manage and monitor your Molochain platform

systemMonitoring.title: System Monitoring
systemMonitoring.description: Real-time monitoring of all system components, performance metrics, and health status across the entire platform.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.description: Comprehensive user administration with role-based access control, permissions management, and activity tracking.

securityControls.title: Security Controls
securityControls.description: Advanced security features including authentication policies, audit logs, and threat detection systems.
